introduction: SYNOPSISThe elderly Chairman Hahm is recuperating at his villa with his young, charming second wife, Ms. Kim. Chairman Hahm's personal secretary Lee Sang-ho visits the villa. Sang-ho and Ms. Kim have a fling. Becoming a slave to desire, Sang-ho plots with Ms. Kim to kill Chairman Hahm. When their first attempt fails, Mi-na, Chairman Hahm's daughter by his first marriage, returns to Korea. After the inheritance matters are worked out, Sang-ho and Ms. Kim try again but they get caught in the trap of Chairman Hahm and Mi-na and are arrested. However, with their magnanimity, Chairman Hahm and Mi-na forgive Ms. Kim.故事年轻，美艳的第二任妻子必须照顾老人谁在与金夫人，总统山寨。但十字架的奴隶，但也私人秘书李相浩，别墅的总统令的关系随着假期的到来金夫人的bonaedeon是痴迷的欲望，内疚，担心也安装有总统基姆·凯谋杀计划。第一次杀人计划失败前米娜复苏的回归之际应该是总统，结束了相互继承和金女士再次试图刺杀总统，而且还逮捕陷入大法官陷阱也注意到总统和米娜他们。然而，如果总统和金夫人米娜给原谅如此广泛的气度。
